channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- sitetweet
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- sitetweet

item.title: CVE-2024-5767|2024-07-02T06:00:03.708Z -- unknown -- sitetweet
item.description: The sitetweet WordPress plugin through 0.2 does not have CSRF check in some places, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow attackers to make logged in admin add Stored XSS payloads via a CSRF attack
